articles.title: Rahm wins first Major as Louis comes up short again - SuperSport
articles.description: Jon Rahm made tension-packed long birdie putts on the last two holes Sunday to win the 121st US Open and capture his first major title, defeating South African Louis Oosthuizen by one stroke.
